comments.body:
While the linux-cache image exists it failed when building the busybox image from the e2eteam repo.  It passed when I used my personal image that a built with this PR.  Does this need to be refreshed?

```
 [stage-3 13/14] COPY --from=ps-helper /Users/ContainerAdministrator/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/PowerShell/docker/ModuleAnalysisCache /Users/ContainerAdministrator/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/PowerShell/docker/ModuleAnalysisCache:
------
error: failed to solve: rpc error: code = Unknown desc = failed to compute cache key: "/Users/ContainerAdministrator/AppData/Local/Microsoft/Windows/PowerShell/docker/ModuleAnalysisCache" not found: not found
```
I've updated the image, and rebuilt my ``claudiubelu/busybox:1.29-1`` image afterwards. It was succesful.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +58,62 @@# Windows Stage
FROM --platform=linux/amd64 $REGISTRY/windows-servercore-cache:1.0-linux-amd64-$OS_VERSION as servercore-helper
FROM e2eteam/powershell-helper:6.2.7-linux-cache as ps-helper
FROM $BASEIMAGE
